sections.heading: Repealed.Section 21-21J-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 1995, ch. 35, § 1; repealed by Laws 2022, ch. 42, § 10.

Repeals.— Laws 2022, ch. 42, § 10 repealed 21-21J-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1995, ch. 35, § 1, relating to short title, effective July 1, 2022. For provisions of former section,seethe 2021 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
